column2: the detecting officer had admitted as having made false entries,
there were  two  other suspects  who  were arrested  subsequent to

the  arrest  of 
the  1st 
accused-petitioner,  whilst  occupying  an
undisclosed  apartment and,  having  introduced  the  drugs which

was 
in 
their  possession 
to 
the  said  accused-petitioners, 
the

officers  have

any  criminal
proceedings. During the appeal, learned Deputy Solicitor General
who  appeared for  the Respondent could  not provide an answer
